test_cases.objective: Verify system installation completed successfully and all components are properly configured

test_steps.action: Verify system installation completed without errors
Check all required services are running
test_steps.expected_result: All critical services show active status

test_steps.action: Verify database connectivity and schema creation
test_steps.expected_result: Database connection established and schema complete

test_cases.objective: Verify user authentication and authorization mechanisms comply with 21 CFR Part 11 requirements
prerequisites: User accounts created with different access levels

test_steps.expected_result: User can only access authorized functions

test_cases.objective: Verify core functionality of Feature Set 1 including data input and processing

test_cases.test_name: Data Input Validation and Processing Test
test_cases.objective: Verify data input validation and processing comply with ALCOA+ principles

test_steps.expected_result: Data rejected with appropriate error message
